prompts.promptText: What does happiness look like to you?
If you could change one thing about the world, what would it be?
What do you think is the most important quality in a friend?
If you could go back and give your younger self one piece of advice, what would it be?
What is something you’re really proud of, but don’t often talk about?
What do you think is the meaning or purpose of life?
If you could experience one day of your life over again, what day would it be and why?
What do you think makes a person truly successful?
What’s the best way to show someone you care about them?
How do you want to be remembered?
What’s one thing you would never change about yourself?
If you could have a conversation with anyone, living or dead, who would it be and why?
Do you believe in fate, or do you think we make our own destiny?
What do you think happens after we die?
What’s something you’ve always wanted to do but haven’t had the chance to yet?
Do you believe people can change, or do they stay the same over time?
What do you think is the most important thing we can learn from each other?
What are you most afraid of, and why?
How do you deal with challenges or obstacles in life?
If you had to live the same day over and over again, how would you make it meaningful?
What does love mean to you?
If you could be any age for the rest of your life, what age would you choose and why?
What’s one thing you’ve learned about yourself this year?
If you could live anywhere in the world, where would it be and why?
If you could ask your future self one question, what would it be?
What’s something you believe in that you can’t see or touch?
If you could only keep five possessions, what would they be and why?
What is one mistake you’ve made that you think was important for your growth?
What would you do if you knew you could not fail?
How do you define ""home""?
What do you think is the most important thing to teach the next generation?
Do you think there’s such a thing as a perfect person? Why or why not?
If you could change how people think or feel about something, what would it be?
What’s something that always makes you feel better, no matter what’s going on?
What is the most important lesson you’ve learned in life so far?
What’s the greatest challenge you’ve overcome, and how did it change you?
If you could solve one global issue, what would it be?
How do you define success in your life?
What’s something you’ve always wanted to ask but never have?
If everyone had to wear a label describing them, what would yours say?
If you could have any superpower, what would it be and why?
What’s your favorite thing to do on a rainy day?
If you could meet any fictional character, who would it be and why?
What’s the best gift you’ve ever received?
If you could travel anywhere in the world, where would you go first?
What’s your favorite family tradition?
What’s one thing you’re really good at?
If you could eat only one food for the rest of your life, what would it be?
What’s the coolest thing you’ve ever seen or experienced?
If you could have dinner with any three people, dead or alive, who would they be?
What’s something that makes you laugh no matter what?
If you could swap lives with anyone for a day, who would it be?
What’s the most adventurous thing you’ve ever done?
What’s your favorite season, and why?
What’s one thing on your bucket list?
If you could live anywhere in the world, where would it be?
What’s your favorite book, movie, or TV show?
If you could have any pet, real or imaginary, what would it be?
What’s one talent or skill you wish you had?
If you had a time machine, where and when would you go?
If you could switch lives with any animal for a day, which one would you choose and why?
What’s one thing that always cheers you up when you’re feeling down?
If you could instantly become an expert in any subject, what would it be?
What’s your favorite way to spend time with family or friends?
If you could learn any language in the world, which one would you choose?
What’s one hobby you’ve always wanted to try but never have?
If you could have any job for one week, what would it be?
What’s something small that makes a big difference in your day?
If you could only watch one movie for the rest of your life, what would it be?
If you were a character in a video game, what powers or skills would you have?
What’s one thing you’ve always wanted to do but are too scared to try?
If you could have a dinner party with any historical figures, who would you invite?
What’s the funniest thing that’s ever happened to you?
If you could magically master any sport, what would it be?
What’s your go-to comfort food when you’re feeling down?
If you could only listen to one type of music for the rest of your life, what would it be?
If you could turn any activity into an Olympic sport, what would you have a chance at winning gold in?
What’s something you think everyone should experience at least once in their life?
If you could have any mythical creature as a pet, what would it be?
What’s your favorite way to relax after a busy day?
What does commitment mean to you, and how do you show it?
When did you first feel truly connected to me?
What do you think is the biggest strength of our relationship?
What are your biggest fears about our relationship?
How do you define “love,” and how has that definition changed over time?
Where do you see us in 5 or 10 years?
How do our goals align, and where might they differ?
What kind of legacy do you want us to leave as a couple?
How important is marriage or children to you?
What does a “successful” life look like to you?
What’s something you’ve never told anyone before?
How do you feel when you’re most vulnerable?
What past experience still affects you deeply today?
How do you process pain or emotional hurt?
In what moments do you feel safest with me?
How do you prefer to resolve conflict?
What do you need from me when we’re disagreeing?
What’s a hard truth about yourself you’ve come to accept?
How do you think we’ve changed each other?
What would you like to work on in yourself or in us?
What makes you feel most loved by me?
What’s your love language, and how do you like to receive it?
What’s a moment of intimacy you’ll never forget?
How do you think physical closeness affects emotional closeness?
What’s something you wish we did more often?
What core values guide your life?
How do you feel about spirituality or religion in a relationship?
How were you raised to think about love, and do you agree with it now?
What ethical line would you never cross?
What do you believe makes life meaningful?
What do you wish I asked you more often?
When do you feel most heard and understood by me?
Have you ever felt misunderstood in our relationship? How?
What’s the hardest thing for you to express?
How do you know when someone is truly listening?
Who are you when no one else is around?
What parts of yourself do you feel still need healing?
What’s a belief or idea you’ve outgrown?
If your younger self could see you now, what would they think?
What’s something about you that most people misunderstand?
What’s the most romantic thing someone has ever done for you?
How do you define emotional intimacy?
What makes you feel deeply connected to someone?
Do you believe in soulmates, and why or why not?
When did you last feel “butterflies” — and what caused it?
What’s the hardest goodbye you’ve ever had to say?
How have past relationships shaped how you love today?
What’s something you’re still grieving?
How do you usually cope when you’re hurting?
What’s the most difficult choice you’ve ever made?
If fear and money weren’t an issue, what would you do with your life?
What kind of life do you dream of building together?
What would your “ideal day” together look like?
What gives your life purpose?
What’s something you’ve always wanted to try but haven’t yet?
What’s a childhood memory that shaped you?
How did your parents’ relationship influence your view on love?
What kind of parent do you think you’d be?
How do you want our home to feel — emotionally and physically?
What lessons from your family do you want to carry forward? What do you want to leave behind?
What was your favorite cartoon as a kid?
Did you ever have an imaginary friend?
What’s the most ridiculous thing you believed as a child?
What’s a toy you always wanted but never got?
If you were a fruit, what would you be and why?
If animals could talk, which one would be the rudest?
If you could switch lives with any fictional character for a day, who would it be?
What would your superhero name be?
If we could go anywhere right now, no budget, where would you want to go?
What’s the weirdest food you’d try on a trip?
Would you rather travel to space or the bottom of the ocean?
What’s the cheesiest pickup line that might actually work on you?
Who’s more likely to survive a zombie apocalypse—me or you?
What’s something I do that makes you laugh, even when you’re mad?
What’s our “couple name” if we were a celebrity duo?
If we opened a restaurant together, what would we serve and what would we call it?
If you could only eat one food forever, what would it be?
What reality TV show do you think we’d crush as a team?
If we had a pet dinosaur, what would we name it?
What movie do you secretly love but are embarrassed to admit?
Which celebrity couple do you think we’re most like?
If we starred in a romantic comedy, what would it be called?
Which fictional world would you want to live in with me?
What’s the weirdest dream you’ve ever had?
If you were a ghost, how would you haunt me?
What’s your go-to dance move when no one’s watching?
Would you rather fight 100 duck-sized horses or one horse-sized duck?
If we had to adopt a zoo animal as a pet, which one would you choose?
What animal best matches my personality?
If our pet could talk, what would it say about us?
Who’s more likely to spoil a pet—you or me?
What’s the strangest food combination you actually enjoy?
If we had to cook a meal together for a cooking show, what would it be?
Who would win in a bake-off between us?
What’s your ultimate guilty pleasure snack?
Would you rather always wear socks soaked in lemonade or pants made of tortillas?
Would you rather have to sing everything you say or always speak in rhymes?
Would you rather be in a bad karaoke competition or a spelling bee on live TV?
Would you rather live in a treehouse or a floating houseboat?
If we were characters in a video game, what would our special powers be?
What would we name our secret spy agency?
If we had an alter ego couple identity, what would our names and backstory be?
What’s your “fake” job if someone asked you to make one up on the spot?
What is the most important lesson you've learned in life so far?
What do you value most in a relationship, and why?
When did you feel the most proud of yourself or someone in the family?
How do you define success, both for yourself and for our family as a whole?
What do you wish people understood better about you?
What is a family tradition or value that you hold dear, and why?
How has our family changed over the years, and how do you feel about those changes?
What do you hope our family will be remembered for?
If you could go back in time and give advice to your younger self, what would it be?
What does family mean to you, and how can we make our bond stronger?
When was the last time you felt truly seen and understood by someone in this family?
What’s something you're afraid to share with others, but feel safe sharing now?
What has been the most difficult thing you've had to overcome in life, and how did you do it?
Is there anything that has been weighing on your heart lately that you want to talk about?
How do you like to be supported when you're feeling down or stressed?
Do you believe everything happens for a reason? Why or why not?
If you had to choose one thing to change about the world, what would it be?
What do you think happens after we die?
What is the biggest mystery about life that you still want to figure out?
Do you believe in fate or free will? How does that shape your life?
What is a dream you have that you haven’t shared with anyone yet?
Where do you see yourself in 5, 10, or 20 years?
If you could change careers or start a new life, what would you do?
What’s something you’ve always wanted to learn or try, but haven’t yet?
If there were no limits, what kind of future would you want for our family?
What has been the most difficult decision you've ever had to make, and how did you cope with it?
How do you handle conflict in relationships, and what can we do to improve how we resolve disagreements in the family?
What is something you regret not doing, and how does that shape your decisions today?
If you could change one thing about your upbringing, what would it be, and why?
What do you think is the most important thing to teach the next generation of our family?
What do you appreciate most about each member of this family?
How do you think we can support each other better, especially during difficult times?
What makes you feel most loved by others in the family?
How can we ensure that every family member feels heard and valued?
What would make you feel more connected to our family as a whole?
What’s your all-time favorite movie or TV show?
If you could eat only one food for the rest of your life, what would it be?
What’s your favorite family vacation spot?
Who is your favorite superhero and why?
What’s your favorite thing to do on a lazy day?
Would you rather have the ability to fly or be invisible?
Would you rather live in a house made entirely of candy or a house made entirely of Legos?
Would you rather time travel to the past or the future? Why?
Would you rather have a pet dinosaur or a pet dragon?
Would you rather always have the perfect outfit but never be able to take a picture or always have messy hair but tons of photos?
If you could switch lives with anyone in the world for a day, who would it be and why?
If you won the lottery tomorrow, what’s the first thing you’d buy?
If you could have dinner with any historical figure, who would it be?
If you could live anywhere in the world, where would you live?
If you could instantly learn any skill, what would it be?
What’s one thing you love doing that no one else in the family does?
What’s your go-to karaoke song?
What’s the best book you’ve read recently?
If you could choose a superpower, what would it be?
If you could change your name, what would you change it to?
If animals could talk, which one would be the rudest?
What’s the most embarrassing thing that’s ever happened to you?
If you could be any character from a cartoon, who would you be?
If you were a fruit, which fruit would you be and why?
What’s the weirdest food you’ve ever eaten and liked?
If you could be famous for one thing, what would it be?
If you could invent something that doesn’t exist yet, what would it be?
If you could have any job for a day, what would it be?
If you could take a road trip with anyone (alive or dead), who would it be and where would you go?
If you could spend a day in any movie or TV show universe, which one would it be?
What’s your earliest childhood memory?
What was your favorite toy when you were little?
What’s the best prank you’ve ever pulled off?
What’s the silliest thing you used to believe when you were a kid?
What’s the most memorable birthday or family celebration you’ve had?
Would you rather have a family dance-off or a family sing-off?
Would you rather go camping in the woods or stay in a cozy cabin for the weekend?
Would you rather have a family game night or a movie marathon?
Would you rather spend a day with no technology or with no food?
Would you rather share one big bedroom with the whole family or have a different room but never see each other?
What do you think happens when we dream? Where do our dreams come from?
If you could live forever, would you want to? Why or why not?
Do you think animals have feelings like humans? How can we know?
If you could talk to one animal, which one would you talk to and what would you ask?
What would the world be like if everyone could read each other's minds?
If you could make a rule that everyone in the world had to follow, what would it be?
If you could choose any superpower, which one would you pick, and how would you use it to help people?
Why do you think we need to be kind to others? What happens when we're not?
Do you think we’re all connected in some way? How could we be connected?
If you could be the president of the world for a day, what would you do first?
What do you think is the most important thing to have in life: love, money, or happiness?
How would the world be different if there was no such thing as time?
What makes you feel truly happy? What do you think other people need to feel happy?
Do you think it's better to be famous or to be unknown? Why?
What would you do if you saw someone being treated unfairly?
What do you think would happen if people stopped worrying about who’s “right” and just listened to each other more?
If you had a time machine, what moment in history would you visit and why?
If you could change one thing about the world, what would it be, and how would it help people?
Do you think everyone sees the world the same way? Why or why not?
What do you think makes someone a hero? Can someone be a hero without superpowers?
If we didn’t have any rules, what do you think would happen?
What do you think is more important: knowing a lot of things or knowing a few things really well?
Do you believe there are other planets with life on them? What do you think they might be like?
How do you know what’s real and what’s just in your imagination?
If you could change your name to anything, what would you choose and why?
Why do you think people sometimes don’t get along, even when they don’t want to fight?
If we could all understand each other’s feelings without talking, what would the world be like?
Why do you think people sometimes act selfish, and what could they do to be more generous?
Do you think we’re all connected to nature in some way? How do we show that connection?
If you could learn any skill instantly, what would it be, and how would you use it?
What do you think it would feel like to be in someone else’s shoes for a day?
Do you think you can change the future? How?
What makes something beautiful? Can anything be beautiful, or do we need to decide what’s beautiful?
Why do you think we dream about certain things? Can dreams tell us something about ourselves?
If you could make one new holiday that everyone would celebrate, what would it be about?
If you could have any superpower, what would it be and why?
What's your favorite thing to do on the weekend?
If you could eat only one food for the rest of your life, what would it be?
If you could live anywhere in the world, where would it be?
What's the funniest thing you've ever seen or heard?
If you could talk to animals, which animal would you want to talk to first?
What's your favorite holiday and why?
If you were a character in a movie, what kind of movie would it be?
If you could meet any famous person, who would it be and what would you ask them?
If you had a time machine, where and when would you go?
What’s the most interesting thing you’ve learned this year?
What’s your favorite book or movie and why do you like it?
If you could change one thing about school, what would it be?
What’s your favorite thing about your best friend?
If you could make a new holiday, what would it be called and how would people celebrate it?
If you could have any pet, real or imaginary, what would it be?
What’s the coolest thing you’ve ever made or built?
If you were a superhero, what would your name be?
What’s your favorite thing to do outside?
If you could switch places with anyone for a day, who would it be and why?
If you could have any job in the world, what would it be?
What’s your favorite song to sing or dance to?
If you could instantly learn any skill, what would it be?
What’s something you’re really good at?
If you could design your dream house, what would it look like?
What’s your favorite thing to do with your family?
What’s the best thing you’ve ever won?
If you could have a robot do anything for you, what would you have it do?
If you could be any character from a book or TV show, who would you be?
What would you do if you had a million dollars?
What’s your favorite meal or dish to cook or eat?
If you could have any superpower, what would it be?
What’s your favorite movie or TV show that never gets old?
What’s the best book you’ve ever read?
Do you have a favorite season of the year? Why?
What was your favorite childhood game or activity?
What’s a song that always brings back memories for you?
What was your first car, and do you have any fun stories about it?
Can you remember your favorite vacation or trip you’ve ever taken?
What was the first concert or event you ever went to?
If you could live in any time period, past or future, which would you choose and why?
If you could meet anyone, living or dead, who would it be?
If you won the lottery today, what’s the first thing you would buy or do?
If you could have any animal as a pet, no matter how big or small, what would it be?
If you could only eat one food for the rest of your life, what would it be?
What was your first job, and how did you feel about it?
What’s something you’ve always wanted to try but never did?
What’s the most adventurous thing you’ve ever done?
What’s a fun fact about you that most people don’t know?
If you could go anywhere in the world, where would you go and why?
What’s the best way to spend a rainy day?
What’s your favorite way to relax after a busy day?
If you had a whole afternoon to yourself, how would you spend it?
Do you have a favorite hobby or pastime that makes you happy?
What’s your favorite thing to do with family or friends?
If you could switch lives with anyone for a day, who would it be?
What’s the funniest thing that has happened to you recently?
If you could be famous for one thing, what would it be?
What’s the best prank or joke you’ve ever pulled off or seen?
If you could create a new holiday, what would it celebrate?
What’s the most surprising piece of technology you’ve seen in your lifetime?
What’s your favorite app or website to visit?
How did you feel about smartphones when they first came out?
What’s something about technology today that you never imagined would happen when you were younger?
What was your favorite way to stay in touch with friends or family before social media?
What’s one of the happiest moments of your life?
What’s a piece of advice you’d give your younger self?
What’s one thing you’re really proud of in your life?
What’s something that always makes you laugh?
What’s one thing that’s always guaranteed to brighten your day?
What’s your favorite dessert or treat?
If you could only drink one kind of beverage for the rest of your life, what would it be?
Do you have a signature dish that you like to cook or bake?
What’s the best restaurant you’ve ever been to, and what did you order?
If you could eat a meal with anyone from history, who would it be and what would you eat?
If you could travel anywhere in the world, where would you go?
If you could try any new hobby or skill, what would it be?
If you could spend an entire day with any historical figure, who would it be?
If you had unlimited time and resources, what would you do first?
What’s a dream you’ve had for years but haven’t yet had the chance to fulfill?
Looking back on your life, what are you most proud of?
If you could relive one moment from your life, which one would it be and why?
What are the biggest changes you’ve seen in the world during your lifetime?
How do you think the world has changed for the better, and where do you think it could improve?
What do you wish you had known when you were younger?
What’s the best piece of relationship advice you’ve ever received or given?
How did you meet the love of your life, and what’s one memory that stands out about them?
What has been the most important lesson you’ve learned from your family or loved ones?
What do you think makes a relationship last for a lifetime?
How did your understanding of love evolve over the years?
What was the most challenging obstacle you’ve had to overcome, and how did you manage it?
When you’ve faced hard times, what helped you stay hopeful or strong?
What do you think is the key to staying positive during tough moments?
How have you dealt with loss and grief, and what advice would you give others going through it?
What are some of the most difficult decisions you’ve had to make in life?
What’s one family tradition or value that you hope gets passed down for generations?
What lessons do you hope your children or grandchildren learn from you?
How did you make sure to nurture and maintain strong family connections throughout your life?
What’s one memory you treasure most from your childhood or raising your own children?
What do you hope your legacy will be, and how would you like to be remembered?
If you could share one piece of wisdom with the younger generation, what would it be?
What is something you’ve always believed but feel differently about now?
What do you think is the meaning or purpose of life?
Looking back, what do you think was the most important decision you ever made?
What do you believe is the secret to living a fulfilling life?
What is one dream you have that you wish you had pursued?
If you could have any wish for the future, either for yourself or the world, what would it be?
What advice would you give someone trying to find their passion in life?
What would you do differently if you had more time or resources in your life?
If you had one more year to live, how would you choose to spend it?
What is something you’ve learned about yourself over the years that you didn’t know when you were younger?
What do you consider to be the most important qualities for living a good life?
How do you stay connected to your purpose or sense of fulfillment?
What is a personal accomplishment you never thought you’d achieve but did?
How do you cope with aging, and what has helped you stay content as you’ve grown older?
Has your understanding of spirituality or faith changed over the years?
What role does faith or spirituality play in your life today?
What’s the most profound spiritual experience you’ve had in your lifetime?
Do you believe in an afterlife? If so, what do you think it’s like?
What do you think is the most important quality in a person, spiritually or morally?
What’s the most fun or adventurous thing you’ve ever done?
What was the best vacation you ever took, and why?
What was your favorite hobby or activity when you were younger, and do you still enjoy it now?
If you could go back to any era in history, which one would you visit and why?
What’s the most surprising thing you’ve learned about life that you never expected?
What do you think is the greatest challenge the world will face in the next 50 years?
Do you believe everything happens for a reason? Why or why not?
What do you think is the most important thing that we should focus on as a society?
If you could change one thing about the world, what would it be?
How do you think our understanding of life and purpose will evolve in the future?
How do you want to be remembered, and what kind of impact do you hope to leave behind?
What advice would you give to your loved ones to help them live their best lives after you're gone?
What is your biggest hope for the future, both for your family and the world?
Is there something you still want to achieve or experience before you reach the end of your journey?
What are the most important things in life, in your view, that we often overlook?
If you could have dinner with any celebrity, who would it be and what would you talk about?
What’s one thing on your bucket list you really want to do?
What’s the most embarrassing thing that’s ever happened to you?
If you could instantly be great at any skill or talent, what would it be?
What’s your go-to song when you need a mood boost?
If you could live anywhere in the world for a year, where would it be?
If you could time travel, what era would you visit and why?
What’s the weirdest food you’ve ever tried and liked?
Who’s someone you really look up to and why?
What’s the craziest dream or goal you have for your future?
If you could only watch one TV show or movie for the rest of your life, what would it be?
What’s your favorite social media platform and why?
If you could swap lives with someone for a day, who would it be?
What’s the best piece of advice you’ve ever received?
If you could make a guest appearance on any TV show, which one would you pick?
If you could live in any fictional world (from a book, movie, or video game), where would you choose?
What’s one app you can’t live without?
What’s something you’ve learned recently that surprised you?
If you were an inventor, what kind of product would you create?
What’s your go-to comfort food after a tough day?
If you could master any instrument, which one would you choose?
What’s one thing you wish adults understood about being a teen?
If you had to pick a new name for yourself, what would it be?
What’s something you’ve always wanted to try but haven’t yet?
If you could change one thing about the world, what would it be?
What’s a hobby or skill you’d love to learn but never had the chance?
If you could be famous for something, what would it be?
What’s the most memorable vacation you’ve ever been on?
What’s your favorite thing to do when you’re alone and bored?
What’s one trend you’ve seen that you just don’t understand?
What’s the most recent show you binge-watched and loved?
Would you rather explore space or the deep sea?
If you could make one rule that everyone in the world had to follow, what would it be?
What’s the last song you had stuck in your head?
If you could be any animal for a day, which one would you be?
What’s the best vacation spot you’ve visited or want to visit?
What would you do if you won the lottery tomorrow?
What’s your guilty pleasure TV show or movie?
If you could live without one modern-day convenience, what would it be?
What’s the craziest or funniest thing that’s ever happened at school?
Who are you when no one is watching?
What does it mean to be truly happy, and do you think it’s possible to achieve that kind of happiness?
Do you believe that people can change, or do you think they are fundamentally who they are forever?
What is something about yourself you’re still trying to understand?
If you could be anyone else for a day, would you? Why or why not?
What does friendship mean to you? What qualities do you value most in a friend?
How do you decide whether to trust someone?
If you could only have one relationship in your life (romantic, friendship, family), which one would you choose and why?
How do you know when to let go of a person or relationship?
What’s the difference between being alone and being lonely?
Do you believe everything happens for a reason, or do you think life is just random?
